title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: According to Binance, the action is due to its plans to enhance liquidity and capital-efficiency for users.This move by Binance will be a big blow to Circle USDC due to the volume of traded assets on Binance.Circle’s USDC is the second largest stablecoin in the crypto market with a market cap of $52 billion, only second to Tether’s USDT, Binance’s BUSD came after USDC with a $19 billion market cap, TUSD and USDP market caps are smaller.Source: https://mycryptoparadise.com/binance-to-convert-users-usdc-usdp-and-tusd-to-busd/

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Two related topics are existing already about this:Binance to remove USDC as a tradable assetBinance to delist USDC, USDP, TUSD from the platfom on 26th SeptemberAlways try to make use of the forum search engine first before posting such news.
